survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Home Water Leak Detection Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and concerns regarding smart home water leak detection systems, including features, pricing, and installation considerations.

questions.question_text: How concerned are you about potential water leaks in your home?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clear differentiation of concern levels. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button layout.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How concerned are you about potential water leaks in your home?

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart home water leak detection features would you consider most valuable? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Battery backup in case of power outage
Voice assistant compatibility (e.g., Alexa, Google Assistant)
Temperature monitoring to detect pipe freezing
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question to identify priority features. Limit to 3 selections to force prioritization.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with maximum 3 selections allowed. Display options in random order.

script.question_text: Which of the following smart home water leak detection features would you consider most valuable? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Battery backup in case of power outage
Voice assistant compatibility (e.g., Alexa, Google Assistant)
Temperature monitoring to detect pipe freezing

questions.question_text: What is the maximum price you would be willing to pay for a smart water leak detection system with all the features you selected?
questions.client_notes: Use pre-defined price brackets for easier analysis. Consider regional pricing variations if survey is international.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Display options in ascending order.

script.question_text: What is the maximum price you would be willing to pay for a smart water leak detection system with all the features you selected?

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, would prevent you from purchasing a smart water leak detection system?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unanticipated concerns. Include character limit (250 max) to ensure manageable responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text response with character counter. Mobile-friendly text input box.

script.question_text: What concerns, if any, would prevent you from purchasing a smart water leak detection system?

questions.question_text: Would you prefer professional installation or a DIY installation for a smart water leak detection system?
questions.client_notes: Important for understanding service model preferences. Include 'Not sure' option for undecided respondents.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Option order should be randomized except 'Not sure' which should remain last.

script.question_text: Would you prefer professional installation or a DIY installation for a smart water leak detection system?

questions.question_text: How important is brand reputation when choosing a smart water leak detection system?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure brand perception importance. Helps inform marketing strategy.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Display options in logical order from high to low importance.

questions.client_notes: Important for understanding integration needs. 'Other' option with text input recommended for uncommon platforms.
